definition: former Taole county, now in Pingluo county 平羅縣|平罗县[Ping2 luo2 xian4], Shizuishan 石嘴山[Shi2 zui3 shan1], Ningxia

sentences.english: And when I'm gone, I'd leave Tara to you.
sentences.chinese: 等我走了，我把陶樂留給你。
